mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), code = #{code}, name = #{name}, memberId = #{memberId}
INSERT INTO boardApplyDoc SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{memberId}, name = #{name}, body = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM board WHERE name = #{name} AND delStatus = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM boardApplyDoc WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT D.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM boardApplyDoc AS D INNER JOIN member AS M ON D.memberId = M.id WHERE M.delStatus = 0 AND D.delStatus = 0 AND D.applyStatus = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE boardApplyDoc SET updateDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1 WHERE name = #{name} AND applyStatus = 0
